Introduction

Yoo Kangmin is a South Korean rapper and dancer under Jellyfish Entertainment. He made his official debut in 2019 as the lead dancer, rapper, and visual of the boy group Verivery.

On September 11, 2018, Kangmin made his debut as the seventh and last member of VERIVERY. A brief film was then shown, along with two reveal images and a behind-the-scenes film. He then debuted as a member of the group with the release of their first mini album, 'Veri-Us', on January 9, 2019.

On February 11, 2022, he graduated from Hanlim Multi Art School as a part of the Practical Dance Department.
